elements.title: flag of Rwanda (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the flag of Rwanda (pictured) depicts the sun illuminating the country's vegetation?

elements.title: Joanna Ferrone (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Joanna Ferrone served as the business manager for the fictional character Fido Dido?

elements.title: queer pro-Palestinian protesters (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that queer pro-Palestinian protesters faced off against the 2024 Philadelphia Pride drumline?

elements.title: Josh Katz (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Australian judoka Josh Katz competed in the 2024 Paris Olympics six months after completely rupturing an ACL?

elements.title: Tunghsing Building (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Tunghsing Building was the only building in Taipei that collapsed after the September 21 earthquake in 1999?

elements.title: Parker Short (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Parker Short became popular on social media for singing and dancing to "Not Like Us" at a rally for Kamala Harris?

elements.title: Rabbinic period (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Rabbinic period was consequential in the ongoing development of Judaism and its traditions?

elements.title: Alexina Kublu (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Alexina Kublu, a linguist, translator, Languages Commissioner, and the first justice of the peace in Nunavut, is her grandmother's father and her daughter's son, as per the Inuit namesake tradition?

elements.title: Shrine of Taharqa (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Shrine of Taharqa was coated in nitrocellulose?
